title: How to start a long conversation with my girlfriend? What topics should I talk about - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, that depends on what she likes and what she is as a person. You may try asking her more about her interests and hobbies, try to find similar things that you like doing or similar beliefs that you share. Maybe ask her about her opinion on popular topics, like the coronavirus, fashion, music, studies, global warming or, whatever she likes to talk about as a person. If you don't know her that well yet, simply ask her what she would like to talk about instead and let her lead your conversation.

For you to want to talk long talks with your girlfriend, means you want her for a long time, ask her about the future, where she wishes to stay, how many kids she want, what she'd do different to her kids compared to how she grew up. And when you ask either of those questions, more will come rolling in.
